Mindful Practices: Course 2
SEL Competencies and Experiential Practices

Self-Management

CASEL defines self-management as:

The abilities to manage oneâ€™s emotions, thoughts, and behaviors effectively in different situations and to achieve goals and aspirations. This includes the capacities to delay gratification, manage stress, and feel motivation & agency to accomplish personal/collective goals.

Experiential Practice

Spend some time exploring the self-management activities below. In the discussion board on the next page, you'll be asked to share which activity you would like to try in your classroom and how you would modify that activity for your students.
